title: Thangalaan
writer: Azhagiyae Periyavan, Tamil Praba, Tamizh Prabha
short_cast: Vikram, Parvathy, Malavika Mohanan, Daniel Caltagirone, Pasupathy, Hari Krishnan, Arjun Anbudan, Preeti Karan
cast: Vikram, Parvathy, Malavika Mohanan, Daniel Caltagirone, Pasupathy, Hari Krishnan, Arjun Anbudan, Preeti Karan
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: To defeat an oppressive landlord, a tribal leader joins a British explorer in a risky search for gold in terrain protected by a feared mystical force.
